meanings.definition: A person who is on the same line as another in a sports team.
meanings.sent1: During the game, my linemates passed the ball to me for a goal.
meanings.sent2: The linemates in the hockey team have great teamwork on the ice.
meanings.sent3: My linemates and I always high-five after scoring a point.
meanings.sent4: In soccer, linemates move together like synchronized dancers.
meanings.sent5: The linemates cheered each other on during the match.

meanings.definition: A person who works closely with another in a collaborative effort.
meanings.sent1: At the office, my linemates and I brainstormed ideas for the project.
meanings.sent2: The linemates in the group project shared responsibilities equally.
meanings.sent3: My linemates and I make a great team, even during tough tasks.
meanings.sent4: In the kitchen, linemates chop vegetables while chatting and laughing.
meanings.sent5: The linemates supported each other to finish the task on time.
